Objectiv Bach Open Taxonomy¶

Objectiv Bach Open Taxonomy is an extension to the Series used in Bach. It allows for specific functionality on the stacks global contexts and location stack) as used by Objectiv.

Reference¶

ObjectivFrame(**kwargs)

ObjectivStack(series_object)

SeriesGlobalContexts(engine, base_node, ...)

Objectiv Global Contexts series.

SeriesLocationStack(engine, base_node, ...)

Objectiv Location Stack series.
